> With the new version it seams that I cannot attach a DecideRule to the D=
Isposition chain, can I?
Answering myself: you may override the "shouldProc=
essRule" property of any processor...

The chain is not a processor but I o=
nly need this with the writer processor :)

Another question: is there a de=
v list? If not: is the JIRA the preferred way of sending patches?

I have m=
irrored the Heritrix3 directory from trunk on Github [1]. There is also an =
experimental branch where I replaced the Restlet 1 code with Restlet 2 and =
JSON answers. I also started with decoupling the HTML generation from the c=
ode. When the REST API answers JSON, the HTML pages may call the API as wel=
l. Plus: I think that JSON is more easy since I do not have to write XSD or=
 something like that in order to get Java Objects. This should make writing=
 clients more easy than with XML?!

Any comments welcome!

Daniel

p://github.com/truemped/heritrix3
